verses.verse: מִ֚י <S%H4310><s%> Who כְּהֶ֣חָכָ֔ם <S%H2450><s%> Who [is] as the wise וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> and who יוֹדֵ֖עַ <S%H3045><s%> [man]? and who knoweth פֵּ֣שֶׁר <S%H6592><s%> the interpretation דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> act חָכְמַ֤ת <S%H2451><s%> wisdom אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> man תָּאִ֣יר <S%H215><s%> to shine פָּנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> maketh his face וְעֹ֥ז <S%H5797><s%> and the boldness פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> of his face יְשֻׁנֶּֽא׃ <S%H8132><s%> shall be changed

אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I פִּי־ <S%H6310><s%> commandment מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's שְׁמ֔וֹר <S%H8104><s%> I [counsel thee] to keep וְעַ֕ל <S%H5921><s%> and in דִּבְרַ֖ת <S%H1700><s%> and [that] in regard שְׁבוּעַ֥ת <S%H7621><s%> of the oath אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּבָּהֵ֤ל <S%H926><s%> Be not hasty מִפָּנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> of his sight תֵּלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> along אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> stand בְּדָבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> thing רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> not in an evil כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he יַחְפֹּ֖ץ <S%H2654><s%> whatsoever pleaseth יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> for he doeth

בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Since דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Where the word מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of a king שִׁלְט֑וֹן <S%H7983><s%> [is there is] power וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> who יֹֽאמַר־ <S%H559><s%> and who may say ל֖וֹ מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What תַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> unto him What doest

שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> Whoso keepeth מִצְוָ֔ה <S%H4687><s%> the commandment לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יֵדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> shall feel דָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> thing רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> no evil וְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> both time וּמִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> and judgment יֵדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> discerneth לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> heart חָכָֽם׃ <S%H2450><s%> and a wise man's

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> though לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every חֵ֔פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> Because to every purpose יֵ֖שׁ <S%H3426><s%> there is עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> time וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> and judgment כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> though רָעַ֥ת <S%H7451><s%> therefore the misery הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man רַבָּ֥ה <S%H7227><s%> [is] great עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <S%H369><s%> no יֹדֵ֖עַ <S%H3045><s%> For he knoweth מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what שֶּׁיִּֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> will happen כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> If כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> will happen מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> who יַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> not that which shall be for who can tell לֽוֹ׃

אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> No אָדָ֞ם <S%H120><s%> [There is] no man שַׁלִּ֤יט <S%H7989><s%> that hath power בָּר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> over the spirit לִכְל֣וֹא <S%H3607><s%> to retain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the spirit וְאֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> and there שִׁלְטוֹן֙ <S%H7983><s%> neither [hath he] power בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הַמָּ֔וֶת <S%H4194><s%> of death וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> is no מִשְׁלַ֖חַת <S%H4917><s%> and [there is] no discharge בַּמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> in [that] war וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יְמַלֵּ֥ט <S%H4422><s%> deliver רֶ֖שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> neither shall wickedness אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּעָלָֽיו׃ <S%H1167><s%> those that are given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner

זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> this רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> All this have I seen וְנָת֣וֹן <S%H5414><s%> and applied אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבִּ֔י <S%H3820><s%> my heart לְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H4639><s%> unto every work אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> wherein נַעֲשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> that is done תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun עֵ֗ת <S%H6256><s%> [there is] a time אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> wherein שָׁלַ֧ט <S%H7980><s%> ruleth הָאָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> wherein one man בְּאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> over man לְרַ֥ע <S%H7451><s%> over another to his own hurt לֽוֹ׃

וּבְכֵ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> And so רָאִיתִי֩ <S%H7200><s%> I saw רְשָׁעִ֨ים <S%H7563><s%> the wicked קְבֻרִ֜ים <S%H6912><s%> buried וָבָ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> who had come וּמִמְּק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> from the place קָדוֹשׁ֙ <S%H6918><s%> of the holy יְהַלֵּ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> and gone וְיִֽשְׁתַּכְּח֥וּ <S%H7911><s%> and they were forgotten בָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> where כֵּן־ <S%H3651><s%> thus עָשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> where they had so done גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> too זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> This הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> this [is] also vanity

אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> Because אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> is not נַעֲשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> is not executed פִתְגָ֔ם <S%H6599><s%> Because sentence מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> work הָרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> against an evil מְהֵרָ֑ה <S%H4120><s%> speedily עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> after that מָלֵ֞א <S%H4390><s%> is fully set לֵ֧ב <S%H3820><s%> therefore the heart בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons הָאָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> of men בָּהֶ֖ם לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> in them to do רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> evil

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Although חֹטֶ֗א <S%H2398><s%> Though a sinner עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> do רָ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> evil מְאַ֖ת <S%H3967><s%> an hundred times וּמַאֲרִ֣יךְ <S%H748><s%> and his [days] be prolonged ל֑וֹ כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again יוֹדֵ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> yet surely I know אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> I אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יִהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become טּוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> that it shall be well לְיִרְאֵ֣י <S%H3372><s%> which fear הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יִֽירְא֖וּ <S%H3372><s%> fear מִלְּפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וְטוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> But it shall not be well לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָֽרָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7563><s%> with the wicked וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and he will not יַאֲרִ֥יךְ <S%H748><s%> neither shall he prolong יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> [his] days כַּצֵּ֑ל <S%H6738><s%> [which are] as a shadow אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> because אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <S%H369><s%> else יָרֵ֖א <S%H3373><s%> because he feareth מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> not before אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> There is הֶבֶל֮ <S%H1892><s%> a vanity אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נַעֲשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> which is done עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָרֶץ֒ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> to whom יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> again there be צַדִּיקִ֗ים <S%H6662><s%> that there be just אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which מַגִּ֤יעַ <S%H5060><s%> [men] unto whom it happeneth אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> according to the work הָרְשָׁעִ֔ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked וְיֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> there רְשָׁעִ֔ים <S%H7563><s%> wicked שֶׁמַּגִּ֥יעַ <S%H5060><s%> [men] to whom it happeneth אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> according to the work הַצַּדִּיקִ֑ים <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous אָמַ֕רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said שֶׁגַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> that this also זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> [is] vanity

וְשִׁבַּ֤חְתִּֽי <S%H7623><s%> Then I commended אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשִּׂמְחָ֔ה <S%H8057><s%> mirth אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> there ט֤וֹב <S%H2896><s%> hath no better thing לָֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> because a man תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֶאֱכ֥וֹל <S%H398><s%> than to eat וְלִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <S%H8354><s%> and to drink וְלִשְׂמ֑וֹחַ <S%H8055><s%> and to be merry וְה֞וּא <S%H1931><s%> and this יִלְוֶ֣נּוּ <S%H3867><s%> for that shall abide בַעֲמָל֗וֹ <S%H5999><s%> with him of his labour יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> the days חַיָּ֛יו <S%H2416><s%> of his life אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> giveth ל֥וֹ הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> which God תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> him under the sun

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> When I applied אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבִּי֙ <S%H3820><s%> mine heart לָדַ֣עַת <S%H3045><s%> to know חָכְמָ֔ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וְלִרְאוֹת֙ <S%H7200><s%> and to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣עִנְיָ֔ן <S%H6045><s%> the business אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נַעֲשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> that is done עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> though גַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> בַּיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> (for also [there is that] neither day וּבַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> nor night שֵׁנָ֕ה <S%H8142><s%> sleep בְּעֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> affliction אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <S%H369><s%> one רֹאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> seeth

וְרָאִיתִי֮ <S%H7200><s%> Then I beheld אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> all the work הָאֱלֹהִים֒ <S%H430><s%> of God כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכַ֜ל <S%H3201><s%> cannot הָאָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> that a man לִמְצוֹא֙ <S%H4672><s%> find out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <S%H4639><s%> the work אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> because נַעֲשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> that is done תַֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> under הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun בְּ֠שֶׁל <S%H7945><s%> though אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יַעֲמֹ֧ל <S%H5998><s%> labour הָאָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> a man לְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to seek [it] out וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> he will not יִמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> yet he shall not find וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> again אִם־ <S%H518><s%> and though יֹאמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> [man] think הֶֽחָכָם֙ <S%H2450><s%> [it] yea further though a wise לָדַ֔עַת <S%H3045><s%> to know לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall he יוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> [it] yet shall he not be able לִמְצֹֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> to find
